name: Ver
description:
Ver is a single player horror adventure game where you traverse through dense fog and deep tombs to complete your objective to collect five crystals while being on the lookout for mutants who's only interest is to chase you down and kill you. The game is set in a valley which progresses from dense foggy open fields to deep underground tombs where you will be met with small corridors, thick fog and patroling mutants. Your goal in the tombs is to find different levers and interact with them to open up new areas and even deeper parts of the tombs to unveil where it all started.

Lootable items that change up the gameplay, such as energyboosts, refills your stamina which could be the decision if you survive a chase or not. Medical supplies to get your health back up to ensure you can take that extra hit that otherwise could have killed you. Items that are picked up have a count showing on the minimalistic UI that displays items, battery, health, stamina and current objective for your awareness.

Roaming ai(Mutants) that will chase you down when you are detected can be found across the map with different variations being a bigger threat than others. Zones with blue lights that indicate safety are also found at certain locations which ai(Mutants) cannot enter. Checkpoints are present at certain locations so should you die all progress isn't lost.
